text: ( music playing )

I need to find
my missing piece.

♪ And be more than
a mystery ♪
( grunting )
Don't worry. Almost got it.

I know all the old wolf den
stones are powerful,

but I've never
seen them do this.

It was only after
I put them on Shrimpy

that my great creation
became a monster.

- Whoa!
- ( crash )

Oh, great!
We can get back in.
( roars )

Not great.
He got back out.

Come on, team.
Let's get that shrimp.
Six heads are better than one.
Actually, we're seven now.
( sad trombone )
( vocalizing )
♪ This is a declaration ♪
( vocalizing )
♪ Of a new generation ♪

♪ We won't break,
we're more than flesh and bone ♪
( teeth chattering )
( roars )
Weird.
That looks familiar.
Aw, pom-poms.
( roars )

That writing on the stones,
it looks so familiar.

It's from the wolf den,
but the pattern's not complete.
Oh, my gosh, you're right.
That V symbol from the vampires,

it's at the top of the pattern
in the wolf den.

Ugh. Of course Vanna would
find a way to crash this party.

At least Shrimpy
can't turn into a bat. I hope.

If the magic
is in the pattern...

Hey, buddy,
can I just see this?

Then destroying the pattern
should stop it!
( roars )
Okay, that didn't stop it.

The vampire stone must
control all the other stones.

So, Vanna the vampire
last year...
♪ Na na na na na na ♪
Now get Vanna-ized.
♪ Na na na na na na ♪

And now her vampire rock
made a rampaging mascot?

Is this monster madness
ever going to end?

Does the vampire stone
control the other stones?

- If you believe the legends.
- I do like to double-check,

but, yeah, usually the legends
are pretty spot on.

Then we have to go
to the wolf den
and find that vampire stone!

- You coming, Zed?
- Like you even have to ask.

But I really like
that she asks.

I'll stay. I think I can
rework the circuit board

and make an electric fence
to try and contain him.
I'll stay and help.

When did you learn
about circuits?
I'll stay and watch.
I'll eat this cheese!

What? It's got monster-fighting,
energy-giving protein.
Probably.
Okay, everyone.
Let's do this.
